comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Many traditional activities carried on despite the war, especially in rural areas that did not live with the constant fear of air attacks. In 1940 a leap year party was held at Llanbrynmair village hall where these women took part in an apple eating competition.
